Base pay range
$100,000.00/yr - $220,000.00/yr
JOB SUMMARY:ResponsibilitiesTranslate functional and non-functional requirements into actionable operational insightsCollaborate with business and technical teams to identify reporting requirementsPrepare functional specification in collaboration with business and data systemsProduce mapping of reporting attributes to tables and columnsCollaborate with FAW development team to deliver business intelligence reportsIntegrate disparate enterprise datasets (TXT, CSV, Avro, etc.) and databases (relational and NoSQL)Perform data validation and QA in preparation for UATAssist with the Sales and Service process across entire EnterpriseContribute in all phases of the software development lifecycleParticipate in scrum sessions using Agile developmentInteract with other team members and customers on regular basisBUSINESS-UNIT & TECHNOLOGIES REQUIREMENTStrong grasp of core data warehouse concept and design paradigmsSolid understanding of Oracle’s analytics offerings including OAC, OBIEE, OBIA, RPD, Machine Learning and Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW)Knowledge of Oracle Cloud Financial System modules - General Ledger, Accounts Payable and Asset Management also desirableExperience with common web connectivity and integration standards/protocols like XML, SOAP, REST, JSON and JDBCExperience interfacing with enterprise applications, databases, service layers, and message queuesExperience with relational (SQL) & NoSQL databasesExperience with Cloud Platforms like Oracle, AWS, Google, Azure, SalesforceStrong academic background with hands-on database programming, algorithms, and implementationDesire & ability to work in a team environment and train on new technologiesExcellent communication skills, both written and verbalExperience Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in a computer science or related field (MS preferred)Experience as a data scientist or developer with Fusion Analytics Warehouse (FAW), Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW), Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC) or Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)Experience with OBIEE, PowerBI, Snowflake, Tableau, etc. also desirableKnowledge of business software solutions like CRM, CPQ, ERPExperience working on enterprise-wide projectsExperience with complex data analysis, data migrations, analytics, and insightsPROMOTIONAL PATHSenior Developer, Lead Developer, Technical Manager, Solution Architect, Senior/Principal Architect, Director, VPThe base compensation range for this position is $100,000 - $220,000 commensurate with experience. Argano also offers a performance-based bonus and strong benefits package including Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K, Paid Parental Leave and Flexible Time Off.#keste
